one pdf pattern for the pig blanket and stuffed body - one pdf file for the adoption cards colour + black and white - one pdf file for care card colour + black and white - one pdf file for info card colour + black and white ►crochet level intermediate/ easy - you will need to know how to read a pattern and have attempted amigurumi before crocheting in the round ►pattern details - this is a fully written pattern with some links to my youtube channel for tips & tricks -
